name: One of Many (brainstormerjr)
description:
Overview

Being able to spawn in multiple copies of a player character with the same controls turns a simple platformer into a challenging puzzle game.

Controls
  • Left click to spawn player characters in the green region, then Enter to confirm
  • WASD - A and D to move, W or Space to jump
  • Left click to freeze players touching the cursor
  • R to restart the level
  • Left and Right Arrow Keys to skip levels that you find difficult or replay levels that you have played before
Bugs
  • The HTML/WebGL version of the game has worse performance than the Windows build. Download the Windows executable if possible
  • Sometimes the player will fall through the ground on the first level. If that happens, restart the level and try again
Tools
  • Game Engine - Unity
  • IDE - Jetbrains Rider
  • Art - Procreate
  • Sound Effects - SFXR
